content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (no other drill positions found) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(106.5, -32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(40.5, -83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5) and transport belts (positions x=63.5 y=-53.5 and x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using stone furnaces without ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using steam engines without connection
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power source before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using electricity groups without being plugged into electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into an electric network before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
- Ensure that pipe groups have fluid before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using belt groups without items
- Ensure that belt groups have items before attempting to use them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or invoked in the provided execution logs.
